module.name: Paging and Intercom
module.changelog: *12.0.9* FREEPBX-8474 Remove duplicate includes from context *12.0.8.1* Add option to force paging through to in-use devices. *12.0.7* Add skeleton support for Multicast RTP *12.0.6* Fix regression where paging wouldn't work with Asterisk 1.8 *12.0.5* Changing the announcement would break auto answer. *12.0.4* Auto-Answer fixes for PJSip and chan_sip *12.0.3* Redo module_hook calls to use static obj *12.0.2* Fix Radio button grouping *12.0.1alpha2* #7112 - Ensure calls are recorded if required. *12.0.1alpha1* Initial Support for PJSip
module.description: Allows creation of paging groups to make announcements using the speaker built into most SIP phones. Also creates an Intercom feature code that can be used as a prefix to talk directly to one person, as well as optional feature codes to block/allow intercom calls to all users as well as blocking specific users or only allowing specific users.
